page.title: 17LOCAL FESTIVALS
page.content: There are several events which take place in Youlgrave. The most exciting ones are the pantomime, carnival and well dressings. When the{pantomime comes round in January everyone gets excited. It lasts for 3 hours and there are l2 performances in the Village Hall.{Carnival week}is in July and this finishes with a procession through the village and a sheep roast and disco at night. The{well dressings are a very important event in Youlgrave. There are also{Harvest festivals, with special services and a harvest supper. There are{Christmas celebrations with services, carol singing and our school produces a special Christmas drama performance in church. Every year the{Pancake Bell}is rung on Shrove Tuesday at 10.00 to remind people to mix the batter. James Barradell-Smith (10)
